name: HCMessageParser
description: `HCMessageParser` parses `message` and returns a dictionary with mentions, emoticons, and links within it. If `blockDone` is passed, asynchronized call(s) will be executed and the titles of all the web links will be filled in the result dictionary and sent to `blockDone` then all the web links are processed. If there are any errors, a dictionary with URL strings as keys and `NSError`s as values will be passed to the block as well.
